No, I cannot spot a situation that will end in an accident where another element is in the same trajectory as my car.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    The video shows a car driving down a street with trees on either side. There are a few other cars on the street, but they are all driving in their own lanes. There are no pedestrians or other obstacles in the road.
